articles.title: Christopher Nolan in India: Want to watch more Indian cinema, says 'Dunkirk' director
articles.description: Multiple Oscar-nominated filmmaker Christopher Nolan, known for "Batman Begins" and "The Dark Knight", says he is interested to watch and know more about Indian cinema.

articles.title: Follow These Steps To Renew Your Jio Prime Membership Till March 2019
articles.description: Jio's prime membership renewal process is not automatic, and subscribers need to do it manually.

articles.title: Indore building collapse: Death toll reaches 10, CM Chouhan announces ex-gratia
articles.description: Madhya Pradesh chief minister Shivraj Singh Chouhan on Sunday announced an ex-gratia of Rs 2 lakh each for the next kin of those killed in the building collapse.

articles.title: Videocon Group-ICICI Bank loan controversy: Chanda Kochhar faces her biggest test in final lap of storied career
articles.description: Chanda Kochhar is known to be quite an “assertive” boss but some of those who know her say she is a professional person and one who knows when to say “no”.

articles.title: Desert Storm rally - not for the weak hearted
articles.description: The Desert Storm Rally is not for the weak-hearted. Despite heat and challenging surroundings of Thar desert, the arduo us event attracts scores of cars and bikes every year.

articles.title: Huawei could be working on a foldable smartphone, reveals patent
articles.description: Huawei, the world's third-largest smartphone maker, is exploring the idea of a smartphone with a foldable display. Apple and Samsung are also rumoured to be working on foldable smartphones.

articles.title: Encounters underway in Shopian, 7 terrorists gunned down

articles.title: VK Singh to fly to Mosul today to bring back bodies of 39 Indians
articles.description: On March 20, Sushma Swaraj informed the RS that all 39 Indians kidnapped by ISIS in Mosul three years ago were dead.

articles.author: Pragya Srivastava
articles.title: e-Way Bill rolls out from today: All you need to know in 10 points
articles.description: e-Way Bill (Electronic Bill) is all set to roll-out from today for inter-state movement of goods and services for value more than Rs 50,000. It is an online generated document required by the person in charge of the transportation for the movement of goods.

articles.author: A. Kameshwari
articles.title: Bollywood heaps praise on Baaghi 2, Hrithik Roshan gives 'Best action hero' title to Tiger Shroff
articles.description: Baaghi 2 has become Bollywood’s highest opener of 2018, surpassing Padmaavat. The Tiger Shroff and Disha Patani starrer minted Rs 25 crore on day one. Directed by Ahmed Khan, the romantic actioner is receiving immense love from Bollywood and audience.

articles.title: CBSE re-exam: Police get reply from Google over 'paper leak' email; updates
articles.description: CBSE announced re-exam for Class 12 economics to be held on April 25, whereas decision on Class 10 maths re-exam to be taken in next 15 days. If required will held only in Delhi NCR and Haryana. Find CBSE latest news and updates.

articles.title: In Midnight Drama, Union Minister's Son Arrested For Bihar Violence
articles.description: Surrounded by hordes of media personnel, Arijit Shashwat, the son of union minister Ashwini Choubey, was arrested late on Saturday night in Bihar's capital Patna, in connection with the communal clashes in Bhagalpur town in the state two weeks ago.
